scripts.build:legal-tech: react-scripts build src/apps/legal-tech-provider-directory/index.js && mv build/static/js/main.*.js build/static/js/legalTechProviderDirectory.js && mv build/static/css/main.*.css build/static/css/legalTechProviderDirectory.css
scripts.build:transparency: react-scripts build src/apps/law-firm-transparency-directory/index.js && mv build/static/js/main.*.js build/static/js/lawFirmTransparencyDirectory.js && mv build/static/css/main.*.css build/static/css/lawFirmTransparencyDirectory.css
